attributes.action: Facilitate the re-introduction of Lucky Charms breakfast cereal into the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Lucky Charms were the best cereal we ever had and I understand they cannot be sold in the UK anymore due to some regulation. Please give us back our lucky charms

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
